about_the_game:
Conqueror's Blade - Regular Unit Training Pack

This DLC includes:

Unit Medal *610

1-Battle Super Unit XP Card *5

Large Chest of Bronze *10

Scroll of Renewal*1

Note:

After purchasing the DLC, you can claim it from Town Criers at both the regional capital and the Trade Colony.

Items from the DLC can only be claimed by one character, so choose your recipient carefully.

Items from the DLC cannot be traded within the game.

[Unit Medal] can be used to upgrade your units.
